bike.description: Specialized A1 Premium Aluminum, w/ concentric BB, fully butted, tapered headtube, forged BB30 BB shell, forged horizontal dropouts w/ integrated chain tensioners, 85mm travel, includes both geared and single speed drop outs, BB30, MID BB and threaded BB shells

components.description: Custom RockShox Monarch RT3, air shock, firm slopestyle tune, hydraulic w/ IFP damping, 3-position Floodgate, Dual Flow rebound adj., alloy shaft, 200mmx50mm
Integrated 1-1/8" upper and 1-1/2" lower threadless, Campy style, full cartridge bearings
Collar, single and multispeed hardware, owner's manual
